sn14.14:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:1.3: Those who have inferior convictions join together and converge with those who have inferior convictions.
sn14.14:1.4: Those who have good convictions join together and converge with those who have good convictions.
sn14.14:2.1: In the past, too, sentient beings came together and converged because of an element. …
sn14.14:3.1: In the future, too, sentient beings will join together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.14:4.1: At present, too, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:4.2: Those who have inferior convictions join together and converge with those who have inferior convictions.
sn14.14:4.3: Those who have good convictions join together and converge with those who have good convictions.”
